in 2003 a pilot named johann haina was
flying a small single person plane over
the remote pumalanga region in eastern
south africa
when suddenly he lost control of his
aircraft and was sent plummeting to the
earth below crashing into a mountainside
miraculously haina was unhurt
as he climbed from the wreckage he was
met with the most astounding sight
there in front of him were three
enormous dolorite monoliths huge stones
many feet high surely weighing many tons
each
and behind these monoliths was a giant
stone circle
haina quickly realized that this was no
natural arrangement of stones
the whole site seemed to be aligned with
the cardinal points on the compass
north south east west
who haina wondered could have built this
mysterious site in such an utterly
remote area
for help solving the mystery haina
enlisted the assistance of his old
friend michael tellinger a
pharmacologist politician musician and
general jack of all trades
they returned to the site of the crash
the next day to begin what would become
months then years of measurements
calculations and research
the immediate results were stunning
the stone ruins were in fact a giant
calendar aligned with the movements of
the sun as well as the solstices and
equinoxes
it could be used to mark every single
day of the year by following the
movement of shadows on the calendar
stone at its center
accordingly the site would become known
in the years to come as adam's calendar
but as further examination and

then came the truly stunning discovery

the kind of patina or skin that grows on

in other words by the time that the
